item.title: Precise and Dexterous Robotic Manipulation via Human-in-the-Loop Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Human-in-the-loop RL enables robots to master complex manipulation tasks with near-perfect success rates and superhuman speed, exceeding prior methods.

item.title: Robots Pre-train Robots: Manipulation-Centric Robotic Representation from Large-Scale Robot Datasets
item.description: Pre-trained robots achieve higher manipulation success rates using a novel manipulation-centric representation (MCR) learned from large-scale robot datasets, surpassing baselines significantly.
